comment.author: Maranda
comment.text: Hillary is letting terrorist into our country and trying to take our guns away at the same time. Wake up Hillary supporters

replies.author: Kyle
replies.text: No matter WHO wins( and I'm with Trump), I fear there's going to be more than 1 assassination attempt. If Hilary wins,I hope it's successful :P
